# How to Install Language Pack Artcam 2008 117
 
Artcam 2008 is a powerful software for creating 2D and 3D designs, models, and toolpaths for CNC machining. It supports multiple languages, but you may need to install a language pack to use the software in your preferred language. In this article, we will show you how to install language pack Artcam 2008 117, which includes English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
 
## Step 1: Download the Language Pack
 
The first step is to download the language pack from the official website of Artcam. You can find the link [here](https://www.artcam.com/downloads/language-packs/artcam-2008-117-language-pack). The file size is about 1.5 GB, so make sure you have enough space on your computer and a stable internet connection.

 ![Artcam 2008 117 Language Pack](https://www.artcam.com/images/artcam-2008-117-language-pack.jpg) 
## Step 2: Extract the Files
 
After downloading the language pack, you need to extract the files from the zip folder. You can use any software that can handle zip files, such as WinZip or WinRAR. To extract the files, right-click on the zip folder and select "Extract All" or "Extract Here". You will see a folder named "ArtCAM\_2008\_117\_Language\_Pack" with several subfolders inside.
 
## Step 3: Run the Setup
 
The next step is to run the setup file that will install the language pack on your computer. To do this, open the folder "ArtCAM\_2008\_117\_Language\_Pack" and double-click on the file "Setup.exe". You will see a welcome screen that will guide you through the installation process. Click on "Next" to continue.
 
## Step 4: Choose the Language
 
On the next screen, you will see a list of languages that are available in the language pack. You can choose one or more languages that you want to install. To select a language, check the box next to it. You can also uncheck any language that you don't want to install. Click on "Next" when you are done.

## Step 5: Confirm the Installation
 
The final step is to confirm the installation of the language pack. You will see a summary of your choices and the location where the files will be installed. If everything is correct, click on "Install" to start the installation. The installation may take some time depending on your computer speed and the number of languages you have selected.
 
## Step 6: Enjoy Artcam in Your Language
 
Congratulations! You have successfully installed language pack Artcam 2008 117 on your computer. You can now launch Artcam and enjoy using it in your preferred language. To change the language of Artcam, go to "Tools" > "Options" > "Language" and select the language from the drop-down menu. You can also switch between languages by pressing Ctrl+L on your keyboard.
